subject: It is my pleasure to commun
body:
It is my pleasure to communicate with you through this medium. My name is TRICHY SESAHDRI SOUNDARA RAJAN, an India National living in Istanbul, Turkey. I am opportune to use this medium to write to you regarding my legal intentions in having investment in your country of residence. I am fully convinced that you will really be of help as a new friend and business partner. I hope my message to you will be given proper attention despite the fact we have not seen or even met each other before.
I am planning to go into investment in your country of origin if you agree to assist me establish, conduct and manage the investment project, since I will not be present in day-to-day running of the business, due to my active function here. I will appreciate it if you can converge on a good relationship for trust. My lawyer will prepare a good memorandum of Understanding to facilitate the success of this project in-line with the law of your country of origin. I can assure you of the success of the business transaction. Humbly indicate your full name, Contact address and contact number while replying.
NB: Due to the current world economic situation you are required to keep the business investment top secret.
Your positive response will be highly appreciated.
Thank you for your understanding.
Kind Regards,
TRICHY SESAHDRI SOUNDARA RAJAN
Tel.+90 532 291 33 25

subject: Re:    It is my pleasure to commun
body:
Hello TRICHY SESAHDRI SOUNDARA RAJAN,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your interest in investing in my country of residence. However, before we proceed further, I would like to know more about the investment project you have in mind. Could you please provide some details about the nature of the business and the potential benefits it could bring?

Additionally, I would like to understand how this partnership would work since you mentioned that you won't be present in running the business. How do you envision our roles and responsibilities? 

I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Willa

subject: Re: It is my pleasure to commun
body:
Dear Willa,
Thank you for replying to my legal investment proposal positively. Be rest
assured that this very business will be a successful one with your complete
support when you stand as the consultant of the investment while I am
standing as an investor and it will be elaborated in our contract business
agreement in line with Apex Bank of Turkey and Turkish Ministry of Finance
and Treasury. The total sum of USD15,000,000.00 will be transferred to any
of your nominated Bank account for the investment after signing our
business proposal agreement as mandated by the inheritance policy in the
shores of Turkey. Our attorney will draft an agreement to explain the full
details of the investment and how the capital will be transferred into your
nominated Bank account in line with our legal and international protocols.
The business investment is legal and favorable to all parties involved in
this project.

Full name:TRICHY SESAHDRI SOUNDARA RAJAN

My address: Ünalan Mahallesi, Libadiye Caddesi No: 81F, D:G Blok, 35722
Üsküdar/İstanbul, Türkiye.
Attached is my India Passport.

We need the following to prepare the details and contract agreement:
(1)Full name
(2)Address
(3)phone numbers
(4)Job
(5)Sex
(6)ID such as International passport,Drivers License or any Government
approved Identification card.

I will be sending you the proposal contract agreement in my next email.


Thank you for your understanding.


Kind Regards,
TRICHY SESAHDRI SOUNDARA RAJAN
Istanbul, Turkey
Whats-app number +90 531 3786694

subject: Re: It is my pleasure to commun
body:
Dear Willa,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the legal investment proposal. I appreciate your interest and would like to learn more about the details of this opportunity. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

1. What specific type of investment is this proposal related to?
2. How does the Apex Bank of Turkey and Turkish Ministry of Finance and Treasury play a role in this investment?
3. Can you explain how the capital will be transferred into my nominated bank account? Are there any fees or charges associated with it?
4. Could you please share more about the legal and protocol aspects of this business investment?

I look forward to receiving your response and reviewing the proposal contract agreement.

Best wishes,
Willa

subject: Re: It is my pleasure to commun
body:
Dear Willa,
Thank you for your second email, the content was clearly understood and
noted. I so appreciate your interest in working with me in making this very
business project a successful one. and even for you to learn more about the
details of the business opportunity could be provided below.
1. What specific type of investment is this proposal related to?  In all my
conclusion, this very business investment in any profitable business
investment is allowed within your local economy. No specific investment,
that is more reasons why you should invest in your area of specialization
or invest in any profitable business investment for the betterment of both
parties involved.

2. How does the Apex Bank of Turkey and Turkish Ministry of Finance and
Treasury play a role? The role of the above organisations is inline with
moving funds. As a non-citizen we must obtain a clearance from the
organisations to enable the successful transfer of the funds into your
nominated bank account .

3. Can you explain how the capital will be transferred into my nominated
bank account? Are there any fees or charges associated with it? The capital
investment will be transferred into your nominated through SWIFT transfer
into your nominated Bank account. We can find any other payment options
once the transfer application is made before our sending bank international
remittance department. The fees could be ascertained during the processing
of the transfer directly to your account. I will be hiring a government
accredited attorney for the drafting of the contract agreement and also for
his legal representation before the Turkish ministry of finance and also
with Yapi Credit Bank legal department.
We need the following to prepare the details and contract agreement:
(1)Full name
(2)Address
(3)phone numbers
(4)Job
(5)Sex
(6)ID such as International passport,Drivers License or any Government
approved Identification card.

I will be sending you the proposal contract agreement in my next email.


Thank you for your understanding.


Kind Regards,
TRICHY SESAHDRI SOUNDARA RAJAN
Istanbul, Turkey
Whats-app number +90 531 3786694

subject: Re: It is my pleasure to commun
body:
Dear Trichy Sesahdri Soundara Rajan,

Thank you for your response and for providing more information about the business project. I appreciate your willingness to share the details with me.

Regarding the specific type of investment, could you please elaborate on what kind of business this proposal is related to? I would like to have a better understanding of the industry or sector involved.

I also wanted to inquire further about the role of the Apex Bank of Turkey and Turkish Ministry of Finance and Treasury. How exactly do they play a role in moving funds? Are there any specific procedures or requirements that need to be followed?

Furthermore, I would like to know more about how the capital will be transferred into my nominated bank account. Could you explain the process in more detail? Additionally, are there any fees or charges associated with this transfer?

Lastly, I noticed that you mentioned providing personal information such as full name, address, phone numbers, job, sex, and ID. Could you please clarify why this information is necessary for the business project?

Thank you once again for your time and cooperation.

Best wishes,
Willa

subject: Re: It is my pleasure to commun
body:
Dear Willa,With my last email I explained myself very clearly regarding
the type of Investment which I said in any lucrative investment in your
locality, no specific investment because every country has a particular
business that is lucrative. I advise you to get a profitable investment in
your locality so that we can channel the capital investment into the
project.

The role of Apex Bank of Turkey here is to get appropriate approval when
transferring funds above USD100,000.00 outside the Turkish bank. The
ministry of Finance is working in line with the central bank of Turkey to
get all the permits before transferring the funds into your nominated bank
account.

The capital will be transferred either by Swift transfer or we can use
other channels like opening a new online account in your name or we can ask
the Bank to credit money into an ATM card.

With due respect sir, without your information we cannot proceed with the
first stage of the business project because our nominated lawyer will use
all your information to draft a contract business agreement.

I will be sending you the proposal contract agreement in my next email.


Thank you for your understanding.


Kind Regards,
TRICHY SESAHDRI SOUNDARA RAJAN
Istanbul, Turkey
Whats-app number +90 531 3786694

subject: Re: It is my pleasure to commun
body:
Dear TRICHY SESAHDRI SOUNDARA RAJAN,

Thank you for your email and for providing more information about the investment opportunity. I appreciate your clarification regarding the type of investment and how it can be tailored to different localities. It's interesting to hear that the Apex Bank of Turkey plays a role in approving funds from outside the country.

I understand that the Ministry of Finance is working closely with the central bank to ensure all necessary permits are obtained before transferring the funds into my nominated bank account. That sounds like a thorough process.

Could you please explain further about the different channels through which the capital can be transferred? You mentioned Swift transfer, opening a new online account, or using an ATM card. How do these options work exactly?

Also, I'm curious to know more about the proposal contract agreement that you mentioned. What will it entail and what are its terms?

Thank you again for sharing this opportunity with me.

Best wishes,
Willa

subject: Re: It is my pleasure to commun
body:
Dear Willa,

With due respect, We need to be focused on the way forward of the
investment project. All necessary explanation has been done and extending
more questions which I considered as a delay in commencing the process of
the business transaction as estimated by our nominated lawyer. The payment
options are made available by the paying bank. Swift transfer means
transferring the funds into your nominated bank account via Swift bank
transfer while opening a new online account is opening a new online account
in your name for the transfer funds via your online account into your local
bank account. An ATM card is issued in your name and sent to you with
activated code to enable you access the ATM Card in any ATM paying machine.

The contract agreement will guide us during the processing of the transfer
and even during the investment in your country of origin.

Hope your questions have been attended promptly.


Thank you for your understanding.


Kind Regards,
TRICHY SESAHDRI SOUNDARA RAJAN
Istanbul, Turkey
Whats-app number +90 531 3786694

subject: Re: It is my pleasure to commun
body:
Dear Trichy Sesahdri Soundara Rajan,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the payment options for the investment project. It's good to know that there are different methods available.

I have a few follow-up questions, if you don't mind. Could you please explain in more detail how the swift transfer works? How long does it usually take for the funds to be transferred into my nominated bank account through this method?

Additionally, I'm curious about the process of opening a new online account. Is it a secure and reliable way to transfer funds? Are there any fees or charges associated with opening and maintaining this account?

Lastly, could you provide some more information about the contract agreement? What are its terms and conditions, and how will it protect both parties involved in the investment?

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Willa

subject: Re: It is my pleasure to commun
body:
Dear Willa,

The type of investment has been attended to in my several messages. I said
again you are allowed to invest these funds into any profitable sector that
will benefit both parties. Please do not repeat this very question because
the question has been answered in my several messages. Invest this very
money in your area of specialization or in any profitable investment in
your local economy. I have no sector to invest in because I was into the
Oil and Gas business here in Turkey before my Boss died.

The swift transfer works with your bank account details and will take only
24 bank working hours to see the funds into your nominated bank account
respectively.

Opening a new online account is a secure and reliable way to transfer the
funds into your nominated bank account because the bank will only request
your full name, address and your government ID to set up the account and
become active within 24 Bank working hours. Some banks charge activation
fees while some banks do not charge for activating online bank accounts.

The contract agreement will guide us during the processing of the transfer
into your nominated bank account and also during the investment in your
country of origin. To avoid further questions kindly provide your
information because all your questions are detailed in the agreement for
further understanding.
Thank you for your understanding.


Kind Regards,
TRICHY SESAHDRI SOUNDARA RAJAN
Istanbul, Turkey
Whats-app number +90 531 3786694

subject: Re: It is my pleasure to commun
body:
Dear Willa,

Thank you for your response. I understand that you have already mentioned the type of investment in your previous messages. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding.

1. Could you please provide more details about the profitable sectors or investments that you suggest? It would be helpful to know what options are available and how they can benefit both parties.

2. You mentioned that the swift transfer will take only bank working hours to see the funds in my nominated bank account. Can you please explain the process of initiating this transfer? How secure is it?

3. Regarding opening a new online account, could you provide more information about which banks offer this service? Are there any specific requirements or fees associated with activating these accounts?

4. You mentioned a contract agreement that will guide us during the processing of the transfer and investment. Could you please share more details about this agreement? What are its terms and conditions?

I appreciate your patience in answering these questions as they will help me make an informed decision. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Willa
